heading: threat suspect nabbed
subheading: an arrest has been made in florida in connection with the threat made in a chat room against columbine high school that resulted in the school being closed two days early for the holiday break. the threat was received by a 16-year-old student at columbine, which saw the worst on-campus massacre in us history earlier this year. police said the threat was made by an aol account holder identifying himself as soup81. the suspect, arrested friday by federal agents, was not immediately identified.
author: wired staff
text: an arrest has been made in florida in connection with the threat made in a chat room against columbine high school that resulted in the school being closed two days early for the holiday break. the threat was received by a 16-year-old student at columbine, which saw the worst on-campus massacre in us history earlier this year. police said the threat was made by an aol account holder identifying himself as soup81. the suspect, arrested friday by federal agents, was not immediately identified.
